Terms of Service

Terms of Service for AI Chat Watch - Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

Last Updated: November 15, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using AI Chat Watch (“the Service”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.

2. Description of Service

AI Chat Watch is an open-source command-line tool that:

  • Monitors and analyzes responses from various AI chatbot models
  • Generates reports on AI model responses
  • Tracks brand mentions and competitive intelligence across AI platforms
  • Provides AI visibility scoring and analysis

3. License

Open Source License

AI Chat Watch is distributed under the MIT License. You are free to:

  • Use the software for any purpose
  • Modify the software
  • Distribute the software
  • Use the software privately or commercially

Subject to the conditions of the MIT License.

4. User Responsibilities

4.1 API Key Usage

You are responsible for:

  • Obtaining and maintaining valid API keys from AI service providers
  • Complying with the terms of service of AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
  • All costs associated with API usage
  • Keeping your API keys secure and confidential

4.2 Acceptable Use

You agree NOT to use the Service to:

  • Violate any laws or regulations
  • Infringe on intellectual property rights
  • Conduct automated, excessive, or abusive queries to AI providers
  • Attempt to reverse engineer or compromise the security of AI providers
  • Collect personal data without consent
  • Distribute malware or harmful code

5. Third-Party Services

5.1 AI Providers

The Service integrates with third-party AI providers. You must comply with their terms of service:

  • OpenAI Terms
  • Anthropic Terms
  • Google Terms
  • OpenRouter Terms

5.2 No Affiliation

AI Chat Watch is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by any AI provider.

6. Data and Privacy

6.1 Local Data Storage

  • All project data is stored locally on your device
  • We do not collect, store, or process your AI queries or responses
  • You are solely responsible for backing up your local data

6.2 Analytics

Our website uses privacy-first, cookie-free analytics. See our Privacy Policy for details.

7. Intellectual Property

7.1 Our Rights

The AI Chat Watch name, logo, and branding are our property. The source code is licensed under MIT.

7.2 User Content

You retain all rights to:

  • Questions and queries you create
  • AI responses you receive
  • Reports you generate

You acknowledge that using AI providers through their APIs may incur costs. We are not responsible for any charges from third-party AI providers.
